name: Silva MD Bot
description: Advanced WhatsApp Bot v3.0 - 58+ commands with AI, media downloads, group management, antidelete, TTS, and more. Built with Baileys library.

SESSION_ID.description: Your WhatsApp session ID (format: Silva~base64_compressed_session). Get it from the session generator.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Bot owner's WhatsApp number with country code (e.g. 254700000000). Required for owner-only commands like eval, broadcast, ban.

BOT_NAME.description: Display name for the bot shown in menus and responses.

BOT_MODE.description: Bot access mode: 'public' (everyone can use) or 'private' (owner and allowed users only).

ALLOWED_USERS.description: Comma-separated WhatsApp numbers allowed to use bot in private mode (e.g. 254700000000,254711111111).

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Automatically view/mark all WhatsApp statuses as seen. Set to 'false' to disable.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Automatically react to WhatsApp statuses with random emojis. Set to 'false' to disable.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Automatically send a reply message to statuses. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Message sent when auto-replying to statuses (only works if AUTO_STATUS_REPLY is true).

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Comma-separated emojis used for random status reactions.

STATUS_SAVER.description: Save status updates (media/text) for recovery. Set to 'true' to enable.

STATUS_REPLY.description: Send a reply after saving a status. Set to 'true' to enable.

STATUS_MSG.description: Message sent after saving a status (only works if STATUS_REPLY is true).
STATUS_MSG.value: SILVA MD üíñ SUCCESSFULLY VIEWED YOUR STATUS

STATUS_SAVE_TO_OWNER.description: Forward saved statuses to the bot owner. Set to 'true' to enable.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Enable anti-delete to recover deleted messages and forward them to owner. Set to 'false' to disable.

ANTI_DELETE_GROUP.description: Enable anti-delete in group chats. Set to 'false' to disable.

ANTI_DELETE_PRIVATE.description: Enable anti-delete in private/DM chats. Set to 'false' to disable.

AUTO_READ.description: Automatically mark incoming messages as read (blue ticks). Set to 'false' to disable.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Show typing indicator when processing commands. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Send a reply for unrecognized commands. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_REACT_NEWSLETTER.description: Automatically react to newsletter/channel messages. Set to 'true' to enable.

NEWSLETTER_IDS.description: Comma-separated newsletter/channel JIDs to auto-follow on connection (e.g. 120363xxx@newsletter).

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for GPT/AI chat features. Get one at platform.openai.com.

ANTI_CALL.description: Automatically reject incoming WhatsApp calls (except from owner). Set to 'false' to disable.

DEBUG_MODE.description: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting. Set to 'true' to enable.
